physical_appearance:\The image shows a lithographic print. It is rectangular in shape and \\Nepenthes rafflesiana\\ is stated at the bottom centre. Above it are two large separate images of a plant. The image on the right side shows the cavity of a pitcher plant and the image on the left side shows the flower stalk of the plant. The flowers are purple in colour and they grow in clusters along the stalk. There are a couple of smaller images of the flower
subject_terms_1:but they are in black-and-white.\ botany
